name: mikado
description: Web's smartest virtual DOM templating engine.
author: Nextapps GmbH

scripts.compile: node task/compile && echo Compile Complete. && exit 0
scripts.build: node task/build RELEASE=min DEBUG=false ENABLE_CACHE=true BUILD_LIGHT=false && exit 0
scripts.build:light: node task/build RELEASE=light DEBUG=false ENABLE_CACHE=true BUILD_LIGHT=true && exit 0
scripts.update: npm install google-closure-compiler@nightly && npm install html2json@latest
